definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: We can drop by the bar and go for a drink.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以順便去酒吧喝一杯。

sentences.english: By the way, the number of the telephone on your desk is extension 506.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一下，你桌上的電話號碼是分機506。

sentences.english: The night watchman brought the armchair for Hewson. He tried to make him laugh.
sentences.chinese: 守夜人給休森搬來了一張椅子，順便逗一下他。

sentences.english: But the way , have you seen Mr Zang . our manager ?
sentences.chinese: 順便問一聲，你見到我們的張經理嗎？

sentences.english: Please give my love to your parents.
sentences.chinese: 順便請代向你父母問候。

sentences.english: My father always picks me up after school.
sentences.chinese: 我父親常開車順便接我。

sentences.english: On my way home I stopped at my aunt's.
sentences.chinese: 回家途中我順便到姑媽那兒去了一會兒。

sentences.english: I'd like to drop by and see you sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 我想在下週某個時候順便來看看你。

sentences.english: The beetle's rainbow colors, by the way, are all natural.
sentences.chinese: 順便說下，葉甲身上彩虹般的顏色都是天然的。

sentences.english: And we would need, to have to look at it, and it's going to be very tricky, by the way, as to what the right answer is.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要去看一看，順便說下，正確答案可能很棘手。

sentences.english: This also includes other caffeinated drinks, by the way.
sentences.chinese: 順便提一下，這也包括其他含咖啡因的飲料。

sentences.english: And btw, all the Chinese Pollutionfigures are fudged.
sentences.chinese: 順便提一句，所有有關中國污染的詩句都是捏造的。

sentences.english: I'd like to drop in and see you sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 我想在下週什麼時候順便來看看你。

sentences.english: He dropped in on some old comrades on his vacation trip to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 他在去北京度假時順便訪問一些老同志。

sentences.english: Komodo dragon, by the way, why does man have to take him all away?
sentences.chinese: 順便說說，科莫多龍。爲什麼人們都要奪走你的生命？

sentences.english: By the way, I like your beard.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一句，我喜歡你的鬍子。

definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
